subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The team’s swift and shrewd moves mean only left fielder Matt Holliday and catcher Yadier Molina are projected to be in the same spots on opening day as they were in early September.
snippet: The team’s swift and shrewd moves mean only left fielder Matt Holliday and catcher Yadier Molina are projected to be in the same spots on opening day as they were in early September.
